snippet: Working with the start-up is the latest part of NBC’s investment in keeping pace with the new ways that people consume news.
abstract: NBCUniversal News Group will announce partnership with NowThis News, start-up that creates short-form news segments tailored for distribution over social media sites; working with start-up is latest part of NBC’s investment in keeping pace with new ways that people consume news.
lead_paragraph: Working with the start-up is the latest part of NBC’s investment in keeping pace with the new ways that people consume news.

headline.main: NBC’s News Unit Teams With Video Start-Up NowThis News
headline.print_headline: NBC’s News Unit Teams With Video Clip Start-Up
